code.ERR_OICE_VALIDATE_ASSET_REQUIRED_BGIMAGE: Missing selected picture. Please check the "background" element at block {{blockIndex}} #{{blockId}}.
code.ERR_OICE_VALIDATE_ASSET_REQUIRED_FGIMAGE: Missing selected sprite. Please check the "Dialogue" element at block {{blockIndex}} #{{blockId}}.
code.ERR_OICE_VALIDATE_ASSET_REQUIRED_IMAGE: Missing selected picture. Please check the "Show Image" element at block {{blockIndex}} #{{blockId}}.
code.ERR_OICE_VALIDATE_ASSET_REQUIRED_BGM: Missing selected music. Please check the "Play Music" element at block {{blockIndex}} #{{blockId}}.
code.ERR_OICE_VALIDATE_ASSET_REQUIRED_SE: Missing selected sound. Please check the "Play Sound Effect" element at block {{blockIndex}} #{{blockId}}.
code.ERR_OICE_VALIDATE_CHARACTER_REQUIRED: Missing selected character. Please check the "Dialogue" element at block {{blockIndex}} #{{blockId}}.
code.ERR_OICE_VALIDATE_ATTRIBUTE_REQUIRED: Mandatory field must be filled.  Please check the element at block {{blockIndex}} #{{blockId}}.
code.ERR_OICE_VALIDATE_INVALID_OPTION_TARGET: The label in the "Go to" field cannot be found. Please check the "Option" element at block {{blockIndex}} #{{blockId}}.
code.ERR_OICE_VALIDATE_INVALID_JUMP_TARGET: The Target Label Name {{value}} cannot be found. Please check the "Jump" element at block {{blockIndex}} #{{blockId}}.

dummyBlock.normal: Drag components from the menu to this block to add them
dummyBlock.hover: Release the compentent to insert it

error.ERR_AUDIO_FORMAT_UNSUPPORTED: This audio format is not supported
error.ERR_AUDIO_TRANSCODE_FAILURE: An error occured when encoding the audio
error.ERR_AUDIO_FILE_SIZE_TOO_LARGE: File size should not be larger than {{size}} Mb
error.ERR_IMPORT_SCRIPT_CHARACTER_FORBID_RENAM: You cannot rename non-generic characters, character ID: {{characterId}}
error.ERR_IMPORT_SCRIPT_CHARACTER_NOT_FOUND: Character not found with ID: {{ characterIds }}
error.ERR_IMPORT_SCRIPT_FILE_CANNOT_OPEN: Please upload a script file in the correct format (.txt)
error.ERR_IMPORT_SCRIPT_LIBRARY_NOT_OWNED: You cannot use the unowned library "{{libraryName}}"
error.ERR_IMPORT_SCRIPT_LIBRARY_NOT_PURCHASED: You cannot use the library "{{libraryName}}" as you have not purchased it yet
error.ERR_IMPORT_SCRIPT_SHOULD_NOT_WRITE_DECLA: Character and background declaration should be inside the <declaration> tag
error.ERR_IMPORT_SCRIPT_SHOULD_NOT_WRITE_SCRIP: Dialogue should be inside of the <script> tag
error.ERR_IMPORT_SCRIPT_USING_UNDECLARED_BACKG: Using a background not defined in the <declaration> section
error.ERR_IMPORT_SCRIPT_USING_UNDECLARED_CHARA: Using a character not defined in the <declaration> section
error.ERR_IMPORT_SCRIPT_WAIT_TIME_IS_NOT_AN_IN: The wait time is not an integer
error.ERR_LIBRARY_NOT_FOR_SALE: The library you visited is not avalible to the public
error.ERR_LIBRARY_PURCHASE_FAILURE: An error occurred while purchasing the asset library. Please contact us.
error.ERR_NOT_POSSIBLE_PHONE_NUMBER: Please enter a valid phone number
error.ERR_TESTFLIGHT_ADD_TESTER_FAILURE: Unable to send invitation, please try again later
error.ERR_USERNAME_LENGTH_TOO_SHORT: Username must be at least 5 characters
error.ERR_USERNAME_CAN_ONLY_START_WITH_LETTER: Username must start with English letter

site.title: oice: visual novels
site.description: oice allows you to choose the setting, characters, props and music to pair with dialogue of your own composition. Each choice choice creates new paths, and each person will have their own experience.
